title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 point(s) maximum

Description (1 point)

• Energy from the sodium gradient

Explanation (2 points maximum)

• The Na+/K+ pump maintains the sodium concentration gradient and allows for the cotransport of glucose

• The symport/inflow of glucose maintains a glucose concentration gradient between the epithelial cells and the blood and allows for (facilitated) diffusion of glucose

• The microvilli/folds on the lumen side of the epithelial cell provide more surface area for uptake of glucose into the epithelial cell
